mapper.insert: insert into temp_tb (temp_tempId, temp_contentId, temp_memberId, temp_contentsBody, temp_date) values (temp_seq.NEXTVAL, #{contentId}, #{memberId}, #{contentsBody}, #{date})
mapper.select: select temp_tempId tempId, temp_contentId contentId, temp_memberId memberId, temp_contentsBody contentsBody, temp_date date from temp_tb
